title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why despite losing to the Steelers, the Bears actually won because they finally found their franchise quarterback. He discusses the struggles Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs offense have been dealing with this season and why having unique talent can be a burden. Colin unveils his Herd Hierarchy ranking the top 10 teams in the NFL after week 9. Plus, Chargers quarterback Justin Herbert joins the show to explain the biggest difference between his rookie season and this year. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
